title: Search and State for NYC Velo Galaxy Jersey
content:
The Galaxy Jersey is Search and State’s first collaboration project in years. NYC Velo is New York City’s premiere bike shop, serving the five boroughs and beyond for over 15 years. It was also one of the very first shops in the world to carry Search and State.

The S2-R is a true performance jersey featuring a 5-pocket design (3 rear and 2 side-seam stash pockets), a slimming, athletic cut, a full-length Riri zipper, inside neck tape, rear locker loop, silicone waist gripper, and a sublime trim package to match.  Of course made in New York City.

See more at Search and State.

The post Search and State for NYC Velo Galaxy Jersey appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
